ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "FSL System Admin", $Profile.Name <> "FSL Dispatch Team Lead Coordinator", $Profile.Name <> "FSL Dispatcher", $Profile.Name <> "FSL Dispatch Manager", $Profile.Name <> "FSL Resource Planner", $Profile.Name <> "E2C Dispatcher" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't create or edit absences. Please contact a dispatcher
